lists.sql: SELECT id,token FROM u_user where account = $1 and password = $2
lists.remarks: 登录验证

lists.sql: SELECT a.id,a.name,a.account,a.password,a.des,a.createtime,a.pid,b.name as pname,b.permission FROM u_user a INNER join u_permission b on a.pid = b.id where a.id = $1
lists.remarks: 通过用户id获取用户信息

lists.sql: SELECT a.id,a.name,a.account,a.password,a.des,a.createtime,a.pid,b.name as pname,b.permission FROM u_user a INNER join u_permission b on a.pid = b.id
lists.remarks: 获取用户信息列表

lists.sql: SELECT a.id,a.name,a.account,a.password,a.des,a.createtime,a.pid,b.name as pname,b.permission FROM u_user a INNER join u_permission b on a.pid = b.id where a.account ~* $1 or a.name ~* $1 or a.des ~* $1  or b.name ~* $1
lists.remarks: 条件查询用户信息列表

lists.sql: INSERT INTO u_user VALUES ($1,$2, $3, $4 ,'{id: ''smartxspace'',value: ''*''}', $5, LOCALTIMESTAMP (1), $6);
lists.remarks: 添加用户

lists.sql: SELECT *from u_user where account = $1
lists.remarks: 根据用户名查询用户

lists.sql: DELETE FROM u_user WHERE id = $1
lists.remarks: 根据id删除用户

lists.sql: update u_user SET name = $1,des = $2,pid = $3 where id = $4
lists.remarks: 根据id修改用户昵称,描述,权限

lists.sql: update u_user SET name = $1,des = $2,pid = $3,password = $4 where id = $5
lists.remarks: 根据id修改用户昵称,描述,权限,密码

lists.sql: SELECT * FROM u_permission
lists.remarks: 获取权限列表

lists.sql: SELECT * FROM u_permission where name ~* $1 or des ~* $1 or createtime ~* $1
lists.remarks: 获取权限列表

lists.sql: update u_permission SET name = $1,des = $2,permission = $3 where id = $4
lists.remarks: 修改角色

lists.sql: INSERT INTO u_permission(name,permission,des,createtime) VALUES ($1,$2,$3, LOCALTIMESTAMP (1))
lists.remarks: 添加角色

lists.sql: DELETE FROM u_permission WHERE id = $1
lists.remarks: 删除角色

lists.sql: SELECT * FROM u_user where pid = $1
lists.remarks: 根据角色id查询用户

lists.sql: select gid as objectid,name,height,buildno,botalt,floorh,floors,houseid,hunitno,hunits,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry from e_buildlevel_pg
lists.remarks: 查询所有分层分户数据

lists.sql: select gid as objectid,name,height,buildno,botalt,floorh,floors,houseid,hunitno,hunits,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry from e_buildlevel_pg where height>$1
lists.remarks: 按照高度条件查询分层分户数据

lists.sql: select gid as objectid,name,height,buildno,botalt,floorh,floors,houseid,hunitno,hunits,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry from e_buildlevel_pg t where ST_Intersects(t.geom,ST_GeomFromGeoJSON($1))
lists.remarks: 按照空间范围查询分层分户数据

lists.sql: select fc.gid as objectid,fc.name,fc.height,fc.buildno,fc.botalt,fc.floorh,fc.floors,fc.houseid,fc.hunitno,fc.hunits,COUNT(b.gid) as peopleNum,ST_AsGeoJson(fc.geom) asgeometry from "E_YBWS_PT" as a INNER JOIN "E_StandAddress_PT" as b on a.id = b.id INNER JOIN e_buildlevel_pg as  fc on (fc.buildno = b.buildno and fc.hunitno = b.hunitno and fc.houseid=b.houseid)  where ST_Intersects(fc.geom,ST_GeomFromGeoJSON($1)) GROUP BY fc.gid ORDER BY  fc.gid
lists.remarks: 按照空间范围查询分层分户数据以及人数信息

lists.sql: select COUNT(*) from "E_StandAddress_PT" b where ST_Intersects(b.geom,ST_GeomFromGeoJSON($1))
lists.remarks: 按照空间范围查询房屋数

lists.sql: select c.sdbm as bid,COUNT(DISTINCT c.buildno) as buildnum,COUNT(DISTINCT b.gid) as peoplenum,COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) as housenum from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id=c.id  where ST_Intersects(c.geom,ST_GeomFromGeoJSON($1)) GROUP BY c.sdbm
lists.remarks: 按照空间范围查询楼栋房屋人数

lists.sql: select c.sdbm as bid,COUNT(DISTINCT a.buildno) as buildnum,COUNT(DISTINCT c.address) as housenum,COUNT(b.gid) as peopleNum from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id=c.id INNER JOIN e_buildlevel_pg as a on (a.buildno = c.buildno and a.hunitno = c.hunitno and a.houseid=c.houseid) where ST_Intersects(a.geom,ST_GeomFromGeoJSON($1)) GROUP BY c.sdbm
lists.remarks: 按照线相交面查询楼栋房屋人数

lists.sql: select c.sdbm as bid,COUNT(DISTINCT a.buildno) as buildnum,COUNT(DISTINCT c.address) as housenum,COUNT(b.gid) as peopleNum from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id=c.id INNER JOIN e_buildlevel_pg as a on (a.buildno = c.buildno and a.hunitno = c.hunitno and a.houseid=c.houseid) where ST_Contains(a.geom,ST_PointFromText($1)) GROUP BY c.sdbm
lists.remarks: 按照点相交面查询楼栋房屋人数

lists.sql: SELECT * FROM "E_StandAddress_PT" where buildno = $1
lists.remarks: 按照楼栋号查询标准地址

lists.sql: SELECT * FROM "E_StandAddress_PT" where buildno = $1 and hunitno = $2 and floorno = $3 and houseid = $4 and cno = $5
lists.remarks: 按照小区编号、楼栋号、单元号、层号、户型号查询标准地址

lists.sql: select gid as objectid,name,height,buildno,botalt,floorh,floors,houseid,hunitno,hunits,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry from e_buildlevel_pg where ST_Contains(geom,ST_PointFromText($1))
lists.remarks: 按照点选查询分层分户数据

lists.sql: SELECT gid as objectid FROM e_buildlevel_pg WHERE buildno=$1 AND hunitno=$2 AND houseid=$3
lists.remarks: 按照点选查询分层分户数据

lists.sql: select gid,objectid,ssjgmc,ssjgdm,mc,dm,cjry,cjrq,ssjwzrqbh,zzjgdm,dz,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry from "D_POLICE_GRID" where geom != 'null'
lists.remarks: 查询派出所数据

lists.sql: select gid,objectid,ssjgmc,ssjgdm,mc,dm,cjry,cjrq,ssjwzrqbh,zzjgdm,dz,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry from "D_POLICE_GRID" where geom != 'null' and ST_Intersects("D_POLICE_GRID".geom,ST_GeomFromGeoJSON($1))
lists.remarks: 按照空间范围查询派出所数据

lists.sql: select gid,objectid,ssjgmc,ssjgdm,mc,dm,cjry,cjrq,ssjwzrqbh,zzjgdm,dz,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry from "D_POLICE_GRID" where geom != 'null' and ST_Contains("D_POLICE_GRID".geom,ST_PointFromText($1))
lists.remarks: 按照点查询派出所数据

lists.sql: SELECT * from "B_COMMUNITY_PT" where jjdwbm ~* $1 or sdbm ~* $1
lists.remarks: 按照派出所查询小区数据

lists.sql: select a.gid,a.cno,b.cname,a.name,a.buildno,a.floors,a.floorh,a.height,a.houses,a.hunits,a.totalhouse,a.address,a.center_x,a.center_y from e_building_pg as a left join "B_COMMUNITY_PT" as b ON (a.cno = b.cno) INNER JOIN (SELECT regexp_split_to_table($1, ',') AS cno) as c on a.cno = c.cno where a.houses is not null
lists.remarks: 按照小区查询楼栋数据

lists.sql: select a.id,a.jjdwbm,a.jjdwname,a.sdbm,a.sdname,a.jwqbm,a.jwqname,a.address,a.jybsname,a.zbx,a.zby,a.buildno,a.hunitno,a.floorno,a.houseid,b.cno,b.cname from "E_StandAddress_PT" as a left join "B_COMMUNITY_PT" as b ON (a.cno = b.cno) where a.cno = $1 and a.address ~* $2
lists.remarks: 按照小区查询标准地址

lists.sql: SELECT a.gid,a.cno,b.cname,b.address,b.jjdwbm,b.jjdwname,b.sdbm,b.sdname,b.jwqbm,b.jwqname FROM e_buildlevel_pg a INNER join "B_COMMUNITY_PT" b on a.cno = b.cno where gid=$1
lists.remarks: 按照id查询分层分户信息

lists.sql: update "E_StandAddress_PT" SET buildno = $1,hunitno = $2,floorno =$3,houseid = $4  where id = $5
lists.remarks: 关联标准地址

lists.sql: SELECT id FROM "E_StandAddress_PT" ORDER BY id
lists.remarks: 查询标准地址id

lists.sql: INSERT INTO "E_StandAddress_PT" VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6,$7,$8,'高层房屋',null,null,$9,$11,$12,$10,null,$13)
lists.remarks: 添加标准地址

lists.sql: DELETE FROM "E_StandAddress_PT" WHERE id = $1
lists.remarks: 删除标准地址

lists.sql: update "E_StandAddress_PT" SET address = $1  where id = $2
lists.remarks: 编辑标准地址

lists.sql: select c.sdbm as bid,COUNT(DISTINCT c.buildno) as buildnum,COUNT(DISTINCT b.gid) as peoplenum,COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) as housenum from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id=c.id where c.sdbm=$1 GROUP BY c.sdbm
lists.remarks: 查询派出所辖区内的房屋及人口数

lists.sql: select gid as objectid,name,height,hunits,totalhouse,address,height as z,center_x as x,center_y as y,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry from e_building_pg
lists.remarks: 查询楼栋中心点

lists.sql: select gid as objectid,name,height,hunits,totalhouse,address,height as z,center_x as x,center_y as y,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry from e_building_pg t where ST_Intersects(t.geom,ST_GeomFromGeoJSON($1))
lists.remarks: 按照空间范围查询楼栋中心点

lists.sql: SELECT b.gid as objectid,a.center_x as x,a.center_y as y,a.name,a.height as z,a.buildno,a.botalt,a.floorh,a.floors,a.hunits,a.houses,a.address,a.totalhouse,b.houseid,b.hunitno FROM e_building_pg as a LEFT JOIN e_buildlevel_pg as b ON b.buildno=a.buildno WHERE a.buildno=$1
lists.remarks: 根据楼栋号查询建筑物和分层分户信息

lists.sql: SELECT b.gid as objectid,a.center_x as x,a.center_y as y,a.name,a.height as z,a.buildno,a.botalt,a.floorh,a.floors,a.hunits,a.houses,a.address,a.totalhouse,b.houseid,b.hunitno FROM e_building_pg as a LEFT JOIN e_buildlevel_pg as b ON b.buildno=a.buildno WHERE a.buildno=$1 and a.cno=$2
lists.remarks: 根据楼栋号和小区编号查询建筑物和分层分户信息

lists.sql: SELECT b.gid as objectid,a.center_x as x,a.center_y as y,a.name,a.height as z,a.buildno,a.botalt,a.floorh,a.floors,a.hunits,a.houses,a.address,a.totalhouse,b.houseid,b.hunitno FROM e_building_pg as a LEFT JOIN e_buildlevel_pg as b ON b.buildno=a.buildno WHERE a.address ~* $1
lists.remarks: 根据地址模糊查询查询建筑物信息

lists.sql: select DISTINCT ON(address) * from (SELECT b.gid as objectid,a.center_x as x,a.center_y as y,a.name,a.height as z,a.buildno,a.botalt,a.floorh,a.floors,a.hunits,a.houses,a.address,a.totalhouse,b.houseid,b.hunitno FROM  e_building_pg as a LEFT JOIN e_buildlevel_pg as b ON b.buildno=a.buildno WHERE a.address ~* $1) as result LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
lists.remarks: 根据地址模糊查询建筑物信息并分页去重

lists.sql: select count(*) from (select DISTINCT ON(address) * from (SELECT b.gid as objectid,a.center_x as x,a.center_y as y,a.name,a.height as z,a.buildno,a.botalt,a.floorh,a.floors,a.hunits,a.houses,a.address,a.totalhouse,b.houseid,b.hunitno FROM e_building_pg as a LEFT JOIN e_buildlevel_pg as b ON b.buildno=a.buildno WHERE a.address ~* $1 ) as result) as result
lists.remarks: 根据地址模糊查询建筑物信息并分页去重总数

lists.sql: select gid as objectid,name,height,hunits,totalhouse,address,height as z,center_x as x,center_y as y,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry from e_building_pg where ST_DWithin(geom,ST_PointFromText($1),0.005/111.325)=true
lists.remarks: 根据经纬度查询建筑物信息

lists.sql: select b.gid,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.sfz,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id=c.id where c.buildno=$1
lists.remarks: 根据楼栋号查询人口信息

lists.sql: select b.gid,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.sfz,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id=c.id where c.buildno=$1 and c.hunitno=$2
lists.remarks: 根据楼栋号、单元号查询人口信息

lists.sql: select b.gid,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.sfz,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id=c.id where c.buildno=$1 and c.hunitno=$2 and c.floorno=$3
lists.remarks: 根据楼栋号、单元号、层号查询人口信息

lists.sql: select b.gid,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.sfz,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id=c.id where c.buildno=$1 and c.hunitno=$2 and c.floorno=$3 and c.houseid=$4
lists.remarks: 根据楼栋号、单元号、层号、户型号查询人口信息

lists.sql: update "E_YBWS_PT" SET name = $1,sfz = $2,phone=$3,rysx=$4,hjaddress=$5 where gid = $6
lists.remarks: 修改人员信息

lists.sql: INSERT INTO "E_YBWS_PT"(id,name,sfz,rysx,hjaddress,phone) VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6)
lists.remarks: 添加人员信息

lists.sql: DELETE FROM "E_YBWS_PT" WHERE gid = $1
lists.remarks: 删除人员信息

lists.sql: select a.gid,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.sfz,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id=c.id INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as a on (a.buildno = c.buildno and a.hunitno = c.hunitno and a.houseid=c.houseid) where b.sfz ~* $1 LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
lists.remarks: 模糊查询，根据身份证号关键字，查询人口信息

lists.sql: select count(*) from "E_YBWS_PT" where sfz ~* $1
lists.remarks: 模糊查询，根据身份证号关键字，查询总人口

lists.sql: select a.gid,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.sfz,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id=c.id INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as a on (a.buildno = c.buildno and a.hunitno = c.hunitno and a.houseid=c.houseid) where b.name ~* $1 LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
lists.remarks: 模糊查询，根据姓名关键字分页查询人口信息

lists.sql: select count(*) from "E_YBWS_PT" where name ~* $1
lists.remarks: 模糊查询，根据姓名关键字分页查询总人口信息

lists.sql: select a.gid,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno from "E_StandAddress_PT" as c INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as a on (a.buildno = c.buildno and a.hunitno = c.hunitno and a.houseid=c.houseid) where c.address ~* $1 LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
lists.remarks: 模糊查询，根据地址关键字分页查询人口信息

lists.sql: select count(*) from "E_StandAddress_PT"  where address ~* $1
lists.remarks: 模糊查询，根据地址关键字分页查询总人口信息

lists.sql: select  a.glsx,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.sfz,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno,fc.gid from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id = c.id INNER join "D_KeyPersonnel_PT" as a on a.sfz=b.sfz INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as  fc on (fc.buildno = c.buildno and fc.hunitno = c.hunitno and fc.houseid=c.houseid)
lists.remarks: 查询重点人员信息

lists.sql: select  a.glsx,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.sfz,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno,fc.gid from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id = c.id INNER join "D_KeyPersonnel_PT" as a on a.sfz=b.sfz INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as  fc on (fc.buildno = c.buildno and fc.hunitno = c.hunitno and fc.houseid=c.houseid) where a.glsx ~* $1 and b.glsx ~* $2 and b.glsx ~* $3 and b.glsx ~* $4 and b.glsx ~* $5 and b.glsx ~* $6 and b.glsx ~* $7 and b.glsx ~* $8 and b.glsx ~* $9
lists.remarks: 多条件查询,根据人员属性查询重点人员信息

lists.sql: select  a.glsx,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.sfz,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno,fc.gid from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id = c.id INNER join "D_KeyPersonnel_PT" as a on a.sfz=b.sfz INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as  fc on (fc.buildno = c.buildno and fc.hunitno = c.hunitno and fc.houseid=c.houseid) where b.name ~* $1
lists.remarks: 根据姓名模糊查询人员信息

lists.sql: select  cc.glsx,fc.gid,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,a.name,a.sfz,a.rysx,a.hjaddress,a.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno from "E_YBWS_PT" as a INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on a.id = c.id INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as  fc on (fc.buildno = c.buildno and fc.hunitno = c.hunitno and fc.houseid=c.houseid) right join (SELECT * FROM "D_KeyPersonnel_PT" WHERE glsx IN ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6,$7,$8,$9)) as cc on cc.sfz=a.sfz where a.name ~* $10
lists.remarks: 根据姓名和管理属性模糊查询人员信息

lists.sql: select b.name as name, fc.gid, a.sfz, a.retiredtime, c.address,a.isretired,c.buildno,c.floorno,c.houseid,c.hunitno from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id = c.id INNER join "B_RetiredUser_PT" as a on a.sfz = b.sfz INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as  fc on (fc.buildno = c.buildno and fc.hunitno = c.hunitno and fc.houseid=c.houseid)
lists.remarks: 退伍军人查询

lists.sql: select  fc.gid,a.xm as name,a.sfz,a.ispartymember,a.membertime, c.address, c.buildno, c.floorno , c.houseid, c.hunitno  from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id = c.id INNER join "B_PartyMember_PT" as a on a.sfz = b.sfz INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as  fc on (fc.buildno = c.buildno and fc.hunitno = c.hunitno and fc.houseid=c.houseid)
lists.remarks: 党员查询

lists.sql: SELECT a.gpsid,a.policeid,a.policename, a.carno, a.callno,b.groupname,c.gpsstyleid FROM "T_GPS_BASEINFO_PT" as a left join  "T_GPS_GROUPGL_PT" as b on (a.gpsid = b.gpsid) left join "T_GPS_GROUP_PT" as c on (b.groupid = c.groupid) where a.gpsid ~* $1
lists.remarks: 根据gpsid查询警力信息

lists.sql: select  a.gpsid,a.policeid,a.policename, a.carno, a.callno,b.groupname,c.gpsstyleid from "T_GPS_BASEINFO_PT" as a left join "T_GPS_GROUPGL_PT" as b on (a.gpsid = b.gpsid)left join "T_GPS_GROUP_PT" as c on (b.groupid = c.groupid) where a.gpsid  ~* $1 or a.callno ~* $2
lists.remarks: 根据警力编号或者呼号查询警力查询信息

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,id,name,vtype,mtype,address,x,y,police_cod,manage_uni,manage_pho,ccname,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "K_Kakou_Chucheng"
lists.remarks: 查询出城卡口信息

lists.sql: SELECT a.gid,a.barxm as name,a.ajbh,a.barhjszdxz,a.ajmc,a.fadzmlxz,a.jyaq,a.x,a.y,b.zdz,ST_AsGeoJson(a.geom) as geometry  FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as a left join  "B_XAM_AJLBDM" as b on (a.ajlb = b.zddm) ORDER BY a.gid
lists.remarks: 查询案件信息

lists.sql: SELECT a.gid,a.barxm as name,a.ajbh,a.barhjszdxz,a.ajmc,a.fadzmlxz,a.jyaq,a.x,a.y,b.zdz,ST_AsGeoJson(a.geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as a left join  "B_XAM_AJLBDM" as b on (a.ajlb = b.zddm) where a.ajbh = $1
lists.remarks: 查询单个案件信息

lists.sql: select ST_AsGeoJSON(geom) as geometry from (SELECT pgr_shortestpath('"A_RoadNetwork_PL"',$1,$2,$3,$4) as geom) as c;
lists.remarks: 查询路径分析

lists.sql: SELECT a.gid,a.barxm as name,a.ajbh,a.barhjszdxz,a.ajmc,a.fadzmlxz,a.jyaq,a.x,a.y,b.zdz,ST_AsGeoJson(a.geom) as geometry  FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as a left join  "B_XAM_AJLBDM" as b on (a.ajlb = b.zddm)  ORDER BY a.gid Asc limit $2 offset $1
lists.remarks: 查询单页案件信息

lists.sql: SELECT a.gid,a.barxm as name,a.ajbh,a.barhjszdxz,a.ajmc,a.fadzmlxz,a.jyaq,a.x,a.y,b.zdz,ST_AsGeoJson(a.geom) as geometry  FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as a left join  "B_XAM_AJLBDM" as b on (a.ajlb = b.zddm) where b.zdz =$1 ORDER BY a.gid
lists.remarks: 查询案件信息

lists.sql: SELECT name_chn,addr_chn,poi_type,x_coord,y_coord,adcode,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAMPOI_PT" WHERE name_chn ~* $1  and poi_type ~* $2
lists.remarks: 根据名称和警所类型模糊查询信息

lists.sql: select fc.gid,a.type,a.sfz,a.xm,a.hdstarttime,a.dmsj,a.hjd,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id = c.id INNER join "B_VirusDate_PT" as a on a.sfz=b.sfz INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as  fc on (fc.buildno = c.buildno and fc.hunitno = c.hunitno and fc.houseid=c.houseid)
lists.remarks: 查询疫情数据

lists.sql: select fc.gid,a.htype,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id = c.id INNER join "B_HouseProject_PT" as a on a.gid=b.gid INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as  fc on (fc.buildno = c.buildno and fc.hunitno = c.hunitno and fc.houseid=c.houseid)
lists.remarks: 查询房屋信息

lists.sql: select fc.gid,a.yqfk,a.sfz,a.date,c.jjdwname,c.sdname,c.jwqname,c.address,c.jybsname,b.name,b.rysx,b.hjaddress,b.phone,c.houseid,c.hunitno,c.buildno,c.floorno from "E_YBWS_PT" as b INNER join "E_StandAddress_PT" as c on b.id = c.id INNER join "B_XAM_VIRUS_PT" as a on a.sfz=b.sfz INNER join e_buildlevel_pg as  fc on (fc.buildno = c.buildno and fc.hunitno = c.hunitno and fc.houseid=c.houseid)
lists.remarks: 查询兴安盟疫情数据

lists.sql: SELECT name_chn as name,addr_chn as address,x_coord as x,y_coord as y, ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAMPOI_PT" where poi_type = $1
lists.remarks: 查询兴安盟poi种类数据

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,mc as name,mc as dz,dm,ssjgdm,zbx as x,zby as y,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "D_JWXQ_PCS_PT" where zbx != '0.00000000000'
lists.remarks: 查询派出所资源点位

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,objectid as id,mc as name,xxdz as dz,x,y,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_LVDIAN_PT" where x != '0.00000000000' and mc ~* $1
lists.remarks: 查询旅店资源点位

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,objectid as id,mc as name,dz,x,y,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_WANGBA_PT" where x != '0.00000000000'  and mc ~* $1
lists.remarks: 查询网吧资源点位

lists.sql: SELECT gid,name_chn as name,addr_chn as dz,x_coord as x,y_coord as y,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAMPOI_PT" where poi_type = '80302'
lists.remarks: 查询重点场所资源点位

lists.sql: SELECT gpsid,time,lng,lat FROM "P_Gps_History" where gpsid = $1
lists.remarks: 查询轨迹信息

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,id,name,vtype,mtype,address,x,y,police_cod,manage_uni,manage_pho,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_VIDEO_PT" where vtype=0 and police_dm = $1
lists.remarks: 根据辖区查询视频点

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,id,name,vtype,mtype,address,x,y,police_cod,manage_uni,manage_pho,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_VIDEO_PT" where ST_Intersects("B_XAM_VIDEO_PT".geom,ST_GeomFromGeoJSON($3)) and (name ~* $1 or manage_uni ~* $2)
lists.remarks: 查询范围内所有满足条件的视频点

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,id,name,vtype,mtype,address,x,y,police_cod,manage_uni,manage_pho,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_VIDEO_PT" where name ~* $1 or manage_uni ~* $2
lists.remarks: 查询所有满足条件的视频点

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,id,name,vtype,mtype,address,x,y,police_cod,manage_uni,manage_pho,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_VIDEO_PT" where ST_Intersects("B_XAM_VIDEO_PT".geom,ST_GeomFromGeoJSON($3)) and (name ~* $1 and manage_uni ~* $2)
lists.remarks: 范围内根据视频的名称、所属机构查询视频点

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,id,name,vtype,mtype,address,x,y,police_cod,manage_uni,manage_pho,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_VIDEO_PT" where name ~* $1 and manage_uni ~* $2
lists.remarks: 根据视频的名称、所属机构查询视频点

lists.sql: SELECT src FROM "B_XAM_VIDEOSRC_PT" where id = $1
lists.remarks: 根据视频id查询视频流地址

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,id,name,vtype,mtype,address,x,y,police_cod,manage_uni,manage_pho,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_VIDEO_PT" where vtype=1
lists.remarks: 查询所有人脸

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,id,name,vtype,mtype,address,x,y,police_cod,manage_uni,manage_pho,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_VIDEO_PT" where vtype=2 and name ~* $1
lists.remarks: 查询所有卡口

lists.sql: SELECT objectid,id,name,vtype,mtype,address,x,y,police_cod,manage_uni,manage_pho,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_VIDEO_PT" where vtype=0
lists.remarks: 查询所有视频

lists.sql: SELECT * FROM "U_PLOTSTYLE"
lists.remarks: 查询标绘表

lists.sql: SELECT * FROM "U_PLOTSTYLE" where lib = $1 and code = $2
lists.remarks: 根据条件查询标绘表

lists.sql: SELECT * FROM "U_Plan" where projectname ~* $1
lists.remarks: 查询预案

lists.sql: INSERT INTO "U_Plan" (projectname,index) VALUES ($1,$2)
lists.remarks: 添加预案

lists.sql: DELETE FROM "U_Plan" WHERE projectid = $1
lists.remarks: 删除预案

lists.sql: update "U_Plan" SET projectname = $1 where projectid = $2
lists.remarks: 修改预案

lists.sql: SELECT * FROM "U_ANIMATIONPROJECT" where projectcode = $1
lists.remarks: 根据projectcode查询动画方案

lists.sql: INSERT INTO "U_ANIMATIONPROJECT" (animationname,projectname,projectcode,animationparam,featureid) VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5)
lists.remarks: 添加动画方案

lists.sql: DELETE FROM "U_ANIMATIONPROJECT" WHERE projectcode = $1
lists.remarks: 根据projectcode删除动画方案

lists.sql: DELETE FROM "U_ANIMATIONPROJECT" WHERE projectcode = $1 and featureid = $2
lists.remarks: 根据projectcode和featureid删除动画方案

lists.sql: update "U_ANIMATIONPROJECT" SET animationparam = $1  WHERE projectcode = $2 and featureid = $3
lists.remarks: 根据projectcode和featureid修改动画方案

lists.sql: SELECT a.id,a.lib,a.code,a.attribute,a.projectname,a.projectcode,b.name,b.modalsrc FROM "U_Model" as a INNER join "U_PLOTSTYLE" as b on (a.lib = b.lib and a.code = b.code) where a.projectcode = $1
lists.remarks: 查询3d模型方案

lists.sql: SELECT a.id,a.lib,a.code,a.attribute,a.projectname,a.projectcode,b.name,b.modalsrc FROM "U_Model" as a INNER join "U_PLOTSTYLE" as b on (a.lib = b.lib and a.code = b.code) where a.id = $1
lists.remarks: 根据模型id查询3d模型方案

lists.sql: INSERT INTO "U_Model" (id,lib,code,attribute,projectname,projectcode) VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6)
lists.remarks: 添加3d模型方案

lists.sql: update "U_Model" SET attribute = $1 where id = $2
lists.remarks: 修改3d模型方案

lists.sql: DELETE FROM "U_Model" WHERE id = $1
lists.remarks: 删除3d模型方案

lists.sql: select ST_AsGeoJSON(geom) as geometry from (SELECT pgr_shortestpath('"A_XAM_ROAD_PL"',122.024336,46.099067,122.088637,46.101171) as geom) as c
lists.remarks: 最短路径查询示例

lists.sql: select ST_AsGeoJSON(geom) as geometry from (SELECT pgr_shortestpath('"A_XAM_ROAD_PL"',$1,$2,$3,$4) as geom) as c
lists.remarks: 最短路径查询方法

lists.sql: SELECT *, ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "A_XAM_ROAD_PL" where id = $1
lists.remarks: 根据id获取最短路径信息

lists.sql: SELECT jq.gid as id,jq.bjnr as bjnr,bjlxmc as name,jq.afdd as afdd,jq.jjyxm as jjyxm,jq.bjsj as bjsj,jq.bjlbmc as bjlbmc,st_x(geom) as x,st_y(geom) as y,ST_AsGeoJson(jq.geom) as geometry FROM "B_JingQing_PT" AS jq WHERE jq.bjsj BETWEEN $1 AND $2 order by jq.bjsj DESC
lists.remarks: 根据时间查询警情内容

lists.sql: SELECT jq.gid as id,jq.bjnr as bjnr,bjlxmc as name,jq.afdd as afdd,jq.jjyxm as jjyxm,jq.bjsj as bjsj,jq.bjlbmc as bjlbmc,st_x(geom) as x,st_y(geom) as y,ST_AsGeoJson(jq.geom) as geometry  FROM "B_JingQing_PT" AS jq WHERE jq.afdd ~* $1
lists.remarks: 根据地址模糊查询警情内容

lists.sql: SELECT aj.ajbh,aj.ajmc,aj.ajmc as name,aj.barxm,aj.jyaq,aj.djrq,aj.fadzmlxz,aj.x,aj.y,ST_AsGeoJson(aj.geom) as geometry,p.mc FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as aj LEFT JOIN "D_POLICE_GRID" as p ON aj.fadzssxq = p.dm WHERE to_timestamp(aj.djrq,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') BETWEEN $1 AND $2 ORDER BY aj.djrq DESC LIMIT $3 OFFSET ($4-1)*$5
lists.remarks: 根据时间区间查询案件信息

lists.sql: SELECT aj.ajbh,aj.ajmc,aj.ajmc as name,aj.barxm,aj.jyaq,aj.djrq,aj.fadzmlxz,aj.x,aj.y,aj.y,ST_AsGeoJson(aj.geom) as geometry,p.mc FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as aj LEFT JOIN "D_POLICE_GRID" as p ON aj.fadzssxq = p.dm LEFT JOIN "B_XAM_AJLBDM" AS ajtype ON aj.ajlb = ajtype.zddm  WHERE (aj.ajmc ~ $1 or aj.fadzmlxz ~ $2) AND substr(ajtype.zddm, 1,1) <= $3 ORDER BY aj.djrq DESC LIMIT $4 OFFSET ($5-1)*$6
lists.remarks: 以案件类型(刑事案件)为条件根据案件地址以及名称模糊查询

lists.sql: SELECT count(1) FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as aj LEFT JOIN "D_POLICE_GRID" as p ON aj.fadzssxq = p.dm LEFT JOIN "B_XAM_AJLBDM" AS ajtype ON aj.ajlb = ajtype.zddm  WHERE (aj.ajmc ~ $1 or aj.fadzmlxz ~ $2) AND substr(ajtype.zddm, 1,1) <= $3
lists.remarks: 以案件类型(刑事案件)为条件根据案件地址以及名称查询案件数量

lists.sql: SELECT aj.ajbh,aj.ajmc,aj.ajmc as name,aj.barxm,aj.jyaq,aj.djrq,aj.fadzmlxz,aj.x,aj.y,aj.y,ST_AsGeoJson(aj.geom) as geometry,p.mc FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as aj LEFT JOIN "D_POLICE_GRID" as p ON aj.fadzssxq = p.dm LEFT JOIN "B_XAM_AJLBDM" AS ajtype ON aj.ajlb = ajtype.zddm  WHERE (aj.ajmc ~ $1 or aj.fadzmlxz ~ $2) AND substr(ajtype.zddm, 1,1) > $3 ORDER BY aj.djrq DESC LIMIT $4 OFFSET ($5-1)*$6
lists.remarks: 以案件类型(行政案件)为条件根据案件地址以及名称模糊查询

lists.sql: SELECT count(1) FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as aj LEFT JOIN "D_POLICE_GRID" as p ON aj.fadzssxq = p.dm LEFT JOIN "B_XAM_AJLBDM" AS ajtype ON aj.ajlb = ajtype.zddm  WHERE (aj.ajmc ~ $1 or aj.fadzmlxz ~ $2) AND substr(ajtype.zddm, 1,1) > $3
lists.remarks: 以案件类型(行政案件)为条件根据案件地址以及名称查询案件数量

lists.sql: SELECT aj.ajbh,aj.ajmc,aj.ajmc as name,aj.barxm,aj.jyaq,aj.djrq,aj.fadzmlxz,aj.x,aj.y,ST_AsGeoJson(aj.geom) as geometry,p.mc FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as aj LEFT JOIN "D_POLICE_GRID" as p ON aj.fadzssxq = p.dm LEFT JOIN "B_XAM_AJLBDM" AS ajtype ON aj.ajlb = ajtype.zddm  WHERE (aj.ajmc ~ $1 or aj.fadzmlxz ~ $2) ORDER BY aj.djrq DESC LIMIT $3 OFFSET ($4-1)*$5
lists.remarks: 以案件类型(全部)为条件根据案件地址以及名称模糊查询

lists.sql: SELECT count(1) FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as aj LEFT JOIN "D_POLICE_GRID" as p ON aj.fadzssxq = p.dm LEFT JOIN "B_XAM_AJLBDM" AS ajtype ON aj.ajlb = ajtype.zddm  WHERE (aj.ajmc ~ $1 or aj.fadzmlxz ~ $2)
lists.remarks: 以案件类型(全部)为条件根据案件地址以及名称查询案件数量

lists.sql: SELECT id,name,address,manage_uni,x,y,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_VIDEO_PT" AS vo WHERE ST_Length (ST_MakeLine ( ST_MakePoint ( $1 :: FLOAT,$2 :: FLOAT ), ST_MakePoint ( vo.x :: FLOAT, vo.y :: FLOAT ) ) :: geography ) < 1000
lists.remarks: 根据案发地方圆1000米查出视频点位信息

lists.sql: SELECT aj.gid,aj.ajbh,aj.ajmc,aj.ajmc as  name,aj.barxm,aj.jyaq,aj.djrq,aj.fadzmlxz,aj.x,aj.y,p.mc,ST_AsGeoJson(aj.geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" as aj LEFT JOIN "D_POLICE_GRID" as p ON aj.fadzssxq = p.dm WHERE aj.ajbh = $1
lists.remarks: 根据案件id查询案件信息

lists.sql: SELECT gid,mc as name,address,x,y,CAST(ST_Length (ST_MakeLine ( ST_MakePoint ( $1 :: FLOAT,$2 :: FLOAT ), ST_MakePoint ( fk.x :: FLOAT, fk.y :: FLOAT ) ) :: geography ) AS INTEGER) as length,ST_AsGeoJson(geom) as geometry FROM "B_XAM_FKD_PT" AS fk WHERE ST_Length (ST_MakeLine ( ST_MakePoint ( $3 :: FLOAT,$4 :: FLOAT ), ST_MakePoint ( fk.x :: FLOAT, fk.y :: FLOAT ) ) :: geography ) < 1000
lists.remarks: 根据案发地1000米内查出所有防控点信息

lists.sql: SELECT count(*) FROM "B_XAM_ANJIAN" WHERE to_timestamp(djrq,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') BETWEEN $1 AND $2
lists.remarks: 以时间区间为条件查询案件总数
